meanings.sent1: The mud was squelchier after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Her shoes became squelchier as she walked through the wet grass.
meanings.sent3: The squelchier noise of the mud made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The squelchier sound of the wet sponge reminded her of a frog croaking.
meanings.sent5: The squelchier sound of the mud was like a symphony of nature.

meanings.sent1: The cake was even squelchier than the pudding.
meanings.sent2: His socks were squelchier than hers after stepping in the puddle.
meanings.sent3: The squelchier texture of the slime made it harder to hold.
meanings.sent4: The squelchier feeling of the mud between her toes was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent5: The squelchier smell of the swamp lingered in the air.
